recommendations: Pankaj Baruah â€œSivareena has been working with me for more than an year now. If there is a situation where I need an opinion about the dots that need to be connected, she is the go-to person. Sivareena is very analytical and methodical in her tasks with professional maturity beyond her years. An ability to see the bigger picture and plan/execute a solution with long term results is a key forte that Sivareena possesses and she just keeps getting better at it. No wonder we could not help but expand here portfolio within an year of her joining us. I wish her best for the career ahead and hope to see her scale pinnacles of achievements.â€

Sriram Somayajula â€œAn analytical and dedicated individual, Sivareena is an awesome colleague to work with. Calm and composed, she became the backbone for inventory management in Furlenco; her efforts in creating and managing a tool that improved inventory visibility are really praise worthy. I would specifically commend her ability to understand complex issues that impact the Company at multiple levels. I am sure she will go places...â€
